carrier_master.hq_address: 1721 W Oak St, Little Rock, AR 72114
carrier_master.driver_satisfaction_notes: Mixed reviews. Good equipment, home time. Pay complaints typical of mid-size. Some dispatch communication issues.
carrier_master.fit_rationale: 600+ trucks, privately held, Little Rock HQ = Arkansas neighbor. West Memphis AR terminal = ALREADY THERE. Every LHS Phase 1 hub on CalArk lanes. Family-owned = faster decisions. Terminal in Rockwall TX aligns with DFW hub.
carrier_master.primary_pitch_angle: You already have a terminal in West Memphis — now your drivers have a private club there too
carrier_master.secondary_pitch_angle: 6 LHS hubs on every CalArk lane — driver amenities coast to coast
carrier_master.exec_summary: CalArk International is a privately held, Little Rock AR-based dry van carrier with 600+ trucks, 2,200 trailers, 800 drivers. Founded 1977. Already has a terminal in West Memphis AR. 48 states + Canada + Mexico. Strong I-40 corridor alignment. Family-owned = faster activation path.
